fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, select two players to Destabilize.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you select yourself to Destabilize, you instead create a Riot.
- During a Riot, all Destabilized targets gain a list of all other Destabilized targets, and MUST deal a basic attack to one of them instead of performing their original night ability.
- If there is only one Destabilized target, you deal a basic attack to them.
- If less than half the Destabilized players died (rounded down) during a Riot, two random players who aren't yet Destabilized are Destabilized.
